tasks.name: ログイン機能 - Testing (TDD)
tasks.prompt:
# Implementation Task: AUTH-001-TEST

## Feature: AUTH-001
## Task: ログイン機能 - Testing (TDD)
## Type: test

## Instructions

1. Write unit tests for business logic
2. Write integration tests for API
3. Cover normal, abnormal, boundary cases

## Constraints
- Follow CODING_STANDARDS.md
- No `any` types
- No console.log in production code
- Handle all error cases

## Acceptance Criteria
- All MUST requirements from SSOT implemented
- Code audit score: 100/100
- Tests pass with adequate coverage
